org.apache.flink.api.scala.operators

类 ScalaCsvOutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichOutputFormat<IT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileOutputFormat<T>
        • org.apache.flink.api.scala.operators.ScalaCsvOutputFormat<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, CleanupWhenUnsuccessful, InitializeOnMaster, OutputFormat<T>, InputTypeConfigurable

    @PublicEvolving
public class ScalaCsvOutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
extends FileOutputFormat<T>
implements InputTypeConfigurable
    This is an OutputFormat to serialize Scala Tuples to text. The output is structured by record delimiters and field delimiters as common in CSV files. Record delimiter separate records from each other ('\n' is common). Field delimiters separate fields within a record.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ScalaCsvOutputFormat

        public ScalaCsvOutputFormat(Path outputPath)
        Creates an instance of CsvOutputFormat. Lines are separated by the newline character '\n', fields are separated by ','.
        参数:
        outputPath - The path where the CSV file is written.

      • ScalaCsvOutputFormat

        public ScalaCsvOutputFormat(Path outputPath,
                            java.lang.String fieldDelimiter)
        Creates an instance of CsvOutputFormat. Lines are separated by the newline character '\n', fields by the given field delimiter.
        参数:
        outputPath - The path where the CSV file is written.
        fieldDelimiter - The delimiter that is used to separate fields in a tuple.

      • ScalaCsvOutputFormat

        public ScalaCsvOutputFormat(Path outputPath,
                            java.lang.String recordDelimiter,
                            java.lang.String fieldDelimiter)
        Creates an instance of CsvOutputFormat.
        参数:
        outputPath - The path where the CSV file is written.
        recordDelimiter - The delimiter that is used to separate the tuples.
        fieldDelimiter - The delimiter that is used to separate fields in a tuple.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAllowNullValues

        public void setAllowNullValues(boolean allowNulls)
        Configures the format to either allow null values (writing an empty field), or to throw an exception when encountering a null field.

        By default, null values are allowed.

        参数:
        allowNulls - Flag to indicate whether the output format should accept null values.

      • setCharsetName

        public void setCharsetName(java.lang.String charsetName)
        Sets the charset with which the CSV strings are written to the file. If not specified, the output format uses the systems default character encoding.
        参数:
        charsetName - The name of charset to use for encoding the output.

      • setQuoteStrings

        public void setQuoteStrings(boolean quoteStrings)
        Configures whether the output format should quote string values. String values are fields of type String and StringValue, as well as all subclasses of the latter.

        By default, strings are not quoted.

        参数:
        quoteStrings - Flag indicating whether string fields should be quoted.

      • open

        public void open(int taskNumber,
                 int numTasks)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Opens a parallel instance of the output format to store the result of its parallel instance.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 OutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 FileOutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
        参数:
        taskNumber - The number of the parallel instance.
        numTasks - The number of parallel tasks.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the output could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Method that marks the end of the life-cycle of parallel output instance. Should be used to close channels and streams and release resources. After this method returns without an error, the output is assumed to be correct.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 OutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 FileOutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the input could not be closed properly.

      • writeRecord

        public void writeRecord(T element)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Adds a record to the output.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        writeRecord 在接口中 OutputFormat<T extends scala.Product>
        参数:
        element - The records to add to the output.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the records could not be added to to an I/O problem.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:

      • setInputType

        public void setInputType(TypeInformation<?> type,
                         ExecutionConfig executionConfig)
        The purpose of this method is solely to check whether the data type to be processed is in fact a tuple type.
        指定者:
        setInputType 在接口中 InputTypeConfigurable
        参数:
        type - The data type of the input.
        executionConfig - The execution config for this parallel execution.
